overview: Jennifer’s dream is to dance on stage at the local strip club, but she can’t seem to break into the biz until she meets Brad, the best pal of the guy who runs the place. Brad promises to get her a dance audition – but only if she’ll return the favor in flesh. Jennifer gets to the top, but not without bumping and grinding her way through a string of salacious sex scenes. Each gal delivers a passionate performance, driving Flesh Dance relentlessly forward on a tidal wave of lust and desire.
title: Fleshdance
